maqras.text: tae yeung minban baekchamh troung robsa anak( mou ham meat) aoy anak
ning ban dk bantouk robsa anak chenhpi anak
del ban phtok yeang thngon now leu khnang robsa anak
haey yeung ban leuk ke tde neam robsa anak aoy khpangkhpasa te ryy
haey pitabrakd nasa cheamuoynung sechakdei lombak vetnea ku pheap ngeayosruol
pitabrakd nasa cheamuoynung se ch kei d lombak vetnea ku pheap ngeayosruol
dau che neah nowpel del anak ban bampenhphearkechch(kechchakar lokey) ruochreal haey chaur anak khetkham korp sakkar champoh yeung
haey tow champoh mcheasa robsa anak temuoyokt chaur anak bng brathnea ning sangkhum
a l laoh sbath nung phle ti n( phle lvea) ning hsaai toun ( phle au liv)
ning phnom tour sai na
ning tikrong nih( mea kkah) del brakabdaoy sokh sa ndi pheap
chea karpit nasa yeung ban bangkeut mnoussa lok sthet knong trongtreay muoy da la brasaer bamphot
banteabmk yeung ban banhchoun puokke tralb towkean kanleng del teab cheangke bamphot( bat nork)
leuklengte banda anak del mean chomnue ning ban sang ampeu la troemotrauv ku puokke nung ttuol ban phalbony chea ni r nd
dau che neah banteabpi nih tow tae ei v del thveu aoy anak( mnoussa lok) bdeseth nung thngai chomnoumchomreah( thngai barlok) noh
tae a l laoh minmen chea anak katsechakdei da brasaer bamphot cheang anak katsechakdei teanglay te ryy
chaur anak( mou ham meat) sautr knongnam mcheasa robsa anak del ban bangkeut( nouv avei teangoasa) choh
trong ban bangkeut mnoussa lok pi kam am n k chheam muoy dom
chaur anak sautr choh haey mcheasa robsa anak mha sabborsa
del trong ban bangrien( kar sarser) daoy slab ba ka
trong ban bangrien mnoussa lok nouv avei delke minban doeng
te. karpit mnoussa lok ku pitchea bampean( leu chbab robsa a l laoh)
daoysaar ke ylkheunh tha khuo l n ke mean krobkrean haey
pitabrakd nasa kanleng vilotralb ku chhpaoh towkean mcheasa robsa anak
tae anak( mou ham meat) bankheunh anak del( a pou cha ha l) hamkhat
khnhom robsa a l laoh( mou ham meat) nowpel delke sa lat te ryy
tae anak ylkheunh yeang dauch me dch brasenbae ke( khnhom robsa a l laoh) sthetnow leu meakra da troemotrauv
ryy ke ban brae knea aoy kaotakhlach a l laoh noh
tae anak( mou ham meat) ylkheunh yeang dauch me d ch der brasen bae ke( a pou cha ha l) ban bdeseth ning berchenh( pi chomnue) noh
tae ke( a pou cha ha l) mindoeng te ryytha a l laoh pitchea kheunh( tongveu robsa ke) noh
phtoytowvinh. brasenbae ke minochhb bampean te noh yeung nung chab kbal robsa ke rounh tomleak tow knong nork cheaminkhan
ku kbal anak del phout kohk ning sang babakamm
dau che neah chaur anak aoy ke srekhaw krom robsa ke mk chuoy choh
yeung nung haw anakyeam nork( daembi chab ke baoh tomleak tow knong nork)
pho t y towvinh chaur anak( mou ham meat) kom thveuteam ke aoy saoh haey chaur anak saou chout ning banhchit khluon tow champoh trong choh
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban banhchouh kompir kuor an nowknong yb a l k d
haey tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha yb a l k d chea avei noh
yb a l k d noh ku brasaer cheang muoy pean khe
mea la ai kat cheachraen ning chi pri l choh mk knong yb noh daoy mean karoanounhnhat pi mcheasa robsa puokke daembi anouvotd real batobanhchea
nowknong yb noh der porpenh tow daoy sechakdeisokh sa ndi pheap rhautadl hva cheu rlech laeng
puok del kmean chomnue nei puok aah li ki tab ning puok mou sh ri kin min baohbng( pheap kmean chomnue ning brakear shi ri k)cheadeachkhat rhaut tealte phosdo tang yeang chbasaleasa ban mokadl puokke
(phosdo tang noh) ku anakneasar mneak( mou ham meat)mk pi a l laoh delke nung sautr kompir da saatasam( kompir kuor an)
del nowknong kompir noh ku meanochbab ning meakra da troemotrauv
haey puok del trauv ban ke phdal kompir aoy min del bekbak knea laey leuklengte kraoypel del phosdo tang da chbasaleasa ban mokadl puokke bonnaoh

haey puokke min trauv ban ke banhchea aoy theu v avei krawpi aoy puokke korp sakkar champoh a l laoh daoy chetd smaoh sa ning troemotrauv champoh trong ning brate b tde sa lat promteang brichcheak hsaa kat noh laey . haey noh kuchea sasanea da troemotrauv

pitabrakd nasa puok del kmean chomnue nei puok aah li ki tab ning puok mou sh ri kin ku se th t nowknong thanonork cheu han nam del puokke nowknong noh chea amt . puok teangnoh kuchea puok del akrak bamphot nei satv lok
pitabrakd nasa banda anak del mean chomnue ning ban sang ampeula troemotrauv . anak teangnoh kuchea anak del la bamphot nei satvalok

kar tabasnang robsa puokke now e mcheasa robsa puokke ku thansuokr at ni n del mean t ne l cheachraen haur pi kraom vea daoy puokke sthetnow tinoh chea amt . a l laoh ban ylprom cheamuoy puokke . haey puokke kaban ylprom cheamuoy trong vinh der . kar tabasnang nih ku samreab anak del kaotakhlach mcheasa robsa ke
nowpel del phendei trauv ban ke thveu aoy ronhchuoy yeang khlangokla
haey phendei ban b po ch nh nouv sakasap teangoasa del mean nowknong khluon robsa vea
haey mnoussa lok ka niyeay tha tae mean rueng avei kaet laeng champoh phendei nih
now thngai noh vea nung brakeasabrab nouv ruengreav robsa vea
piproh mcheasa robsa anak ban banhchea aoy vea thveu dauchnaoh
now thngai noh der mnoussa lok nung chenhpi phnaur mk teang krom khosa knea daembi ttuol kar bangheanh aoy kheunh nouv ampeu teanglay robsa puokke
dau che neah anak del thveu ampeula saumbi mean tomngon bon lomangthouli ka ke nung kheunh vea der
chamnek e anak del thveuampeu akrak saumbi mean tomngon bon lomangthouli ka ke nung meulkheunh vea der
a l laoh sbath nung satv seh teanglay del rt teang danghok nowknong samorphoumi
ning satv seh del rt yeang luen chenh phkaphleung tam krachk robsa vea
ning satv seh del vea baol samrouk tow khmangosatrauv teang pruk prolum
haey puokvea thveu aoy thouli hoyotrolom nowchampohmoukh puok satrauv
haey puokvea samroukchaul tow kandal hvaung satrauv
pitabrakd nasa mnoussa lok ku rmilkoun champoh mcheasa robsa ke
haey pitabrakd nasa ke kuchea saksaei leu rueng noh
piproh ke kuchea mnoussa del sraleanh tropy sa mb tde yeang khlang
